## HorizontalFlyout.getClientRect() method

Returns the bounding rectangle of the drag target area in pixel units relative to viewport.  The component's bounding box. Null if drag target area should be ignored.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getClientRect(): Rect | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Rect \| null
